title: [Large-Scale] Foundational Dental Behavioral Science Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and communication skills
context.additional_context: Basic dental behavioral science competency enhancement program for corporate managers/leaders, with supplementary learning materials available via smartphone.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic psychological theories (motivation, stress management, etc.) for understanding patient behavior.
Learners can present three or more behavioral science-based techniques for effective dental communication.
Learners can apply situational behavioral strategies to improve patient cooperation in real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
